snippet: Justin Smith has been playing with a partially torn triceps tendon for the 49ers, who face the Falcons in the N.F.C. championship game Sunday.
abstract: San Francisco 49ers defensive end Justin Smith, who is preparing with team for NFC championship game against Atlanta Falcons, has been playing with a partially torn triceps tendon since mid-December; will undergo surgery in off-season.
lead_paragraph: Justin Smith has been playing with a partially torn triceps tendon for the 49ers, who face the Falcons in the N.F.C. championship game Sunday.

headline.seo: 49ers’ Justin Smith Shakes Off Focus on Injured Arm
headline.main: 49ers Star Shakes Off Focus on Injury
headline.print_headline: 49ers Star Shakes Off Focus on Injury
